directions: Mix tilapia, avocados, garlic, habanero pepper, cilantro, salt, pepper, and ginger in a bowl. Pour enough lime juice over tilapia mixture to cover completely. Arrange onions over mixture without submerging into the lime juice. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until fish is tender and opaque, at least 4 hours.
ingredients: 2 pounds tilapia fillets, cut into cubes, or more to taste
2 small semi-firm avocados, cut into cubes, or more to taste
8 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
30 fluid ounces lime juice, or as needed
20 small flour tortillas, or as needed (optional)
title: Avocado and Tilapia Ceviche
